author: jim
msg: Set at init time, and combine comments

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Ludovic Maître "Add support for running one instance of OfBiz under Tomcat" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-1738) OFBIZ-1738
I did not test anything, I just added ASL headers to bat and sh scripts in the 55 branch and made a page in Wiki at http://docs.ofbiz.org/x/gR from the Ludovic's how to.
I did so for 2 main reasons :
1. I have no time to test thorougly, and I suppose that it works from Ludovic comments in Jira issue
2. It's harmless for the project, only people interested may encounter issues if any
